title: Boku No Kanojo Wa Dekkawaii
alternative_title: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ ; My Girl Friend Is Big & Cute! ; Minha namorada é grande e fofa! ; My Girlfriend Is Big & Cute! ; My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute! ; My Girlfriend Is Giganticute ; Boku no Kanojo wa Dekkawaii ; Moja Dziewczyna Jest Wysoka i Urocza
status: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ ; My Girl Friend Is Big & Cute! ; Minha namorada é grande e fofa! ; My Girlfriend Is Big & Cute! ; My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute! ; My Girlfriend Is Giganticute ; Boku no Kanojo wa Dekkawaii ; Moja Dziewczyna Jest Wysoka i Urocza
description:
Description :
        For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him.
Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world.
The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
